item.title: How to automatically plural words in Python
item.description: inflect correctly generate plurals, singular nouns, ordinals, indefinite articles; convert numbers to words.parameters Installation This library can be installed via pip > pip install inflect and the full documentation of this library can be found here How Does it Work? When do we need this tool print("You want to see {} variable".format(user_variable)) No matter the value of user_variable, the output will always be something like You want to see X variable Problem here!
